data.caption: Clarification On Query Regarding News Item Appearing In "Https://Economictimes.Indiatimes.Com/"
data.news_body: Clarification/ Confirmation on news item appearing in economics time

data.caption: Clarification sought from Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Ltd on September 9 2025 with reference to news appeared in https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/ dated September 9 2025 quoting "Ujjivan plans to raise Rs 2000 crore via QIP route"

The reply is awaited.
